snippet: The firm has acquired a roughly 6 percent stake in Staples, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday. The hedge fund also bolstered its holdings in Office Depot — where it previously sat on the board — to 10 percent, from 8.6 percent.
abstract: The firm has acquired a roughly 6 percent stake in Staples, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday. The hedge fund also bolstered its holdings in Office Depot — where it previously sat on the board — to 10 percent, from 8.6 percent.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Starboard Said to Amass a Big Stake in Staples
